title: Aaron Rodgers Reaction, Plus Offseason Predictions
description:
Kevin, Nora, and Steven open up by discussing Aaron Rodgers’s cryptic Instagram post and whether he will or will not play next season. They finish by debating the biggest winners in free agency, Tom Brady, QBs in the draft, and other offseason issues. 

Host: Kevin Clark, Nora Princiotti, and Steven Ruiz
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
